name: Solitaire Cooking Tower
description:
Welcome to Solitaire Cooking Tower - Best Card Game!
Build your own restaurants while playing your favorite solitaire!

> Just like the old days!
Remember the old solitaire game on your PC that you used to love? Well, things just got better!

> Build Restaurants!
Hot dogs, tacos, Chinese food, and so on. Variety of restaurants to choose and build from!

> Start Collecting Cards Decks!
Create your own Card Decks while playing solitaire!
Puppy Decks, Kitty Decks, Blossom Decks and much more!

More Card Deckss & restaurants all over the world will continue to be updated in-game!
